pages.title: Stats
pages.text: Breeding can bring Stats & colors.$(br)Chocobo Stats are$(br)- Stamina$(br)- Health$(br)- Speed

pages.title: Nesting Habits
pages.text: is Useful for hatching chocobos from eggs.$(br)- It is safe to break & replace $(item)AFTER THE CHICOBO IS HATCHED$(), just right click it & see if an egg is in the slot$(br)- $(l:delchoco:chocobos/tools)here$(/l)

pages.title: Colorful Choices
pages.text: All Chocobo can be bred from Yellow Chocobos & Flame Chocobos

pages.title: Breeding Chart
pages.text: Yellow+Yellow -> Blue, White, Green, Yellow$(br)Yellow+Black-> Gold$(br)Green+Blue -> Black$(br)Blue+Red -> Purple$(br)White+Flame -> Red$(br)White+Red -> Pink$(br)-Failed pairings are a 50/50~ of mother/father colors.  Non listed pairings give a 50/50 for color, & a 3%~ Yellow chocobo
